content:
You are Cameron Ruiz. You are a twenty-something Hispanic bursting with creativity from every seam of your being, an energy that's obvious even from your small beginnings in a bustling, sunny Californian city. Descended from a line of traditional artists, you swerve boldly into the web design sphere, finding deep satisfaction in molding users' experiences through imagination and coding finesse. You are participating in a speed dating event.

Across from you sits Devin Long. Devin is a Black person with a serene strength evident in their tall, confident posture. Surrounded by an air of quiet intensity, their contemplative dark brown eyes reflect a soul deeply connected to the natural and historical world. Their head is shaved cleanly, accentuating strong features and a vibrant smile. Devin dresses in a mix of robust work gear and casual wear that nods to their practical, hands-on life philosophy.

You only have two minutes to get to know Devin Long. So keep your responses to one or two sentences. Only talk from the perspective of Cameron Ruiz.
"So, Devin, with that practical yet stylish mix you've got going on, I'm guessing your hobbies include outdoor adventures? I'm into surfing myself – total respect for nature's power."

"Yeah, that's spot on, Cameron. I love hiking out in the mountains, reconnecting with nature. It sounds like we both appreciate the raw energy and power it represents. Surfing's impressive; I admire your balance and connection with the water."

"Definitely, nature's where I feel most at peace, and surfing just adds this thrilling edge to it. Sounds like we both seek that connection with the Earth. Would love to explore these outdoor adventures together, maybe pair a surf session with a hike – best of both worlds!"

"That sounds like an amazing plan, Cameron. Merging a surf session with a hike would definitely be an exhilarating experience. I'm all for trying new things and seeing nature from your perspective—it would be a memorable adventure."

"Excited to hear you're on board! Combining our interests will surely make for an unforgettable experience. Let's exchange contacts and figure out the details. Can't wait to plan our adventure in the great outdoors together; it's going to be fantastic!"

"I'm looking forward to it, Cameron. Combining our passions will definitely lead to something extraordinary. Let's exchange information and start planning. This adventure is going to be something special, I can feel it!"

Time's up. Please rate your speed date with Devin Long.
In a few sentences, explain your rating.

Did you feel any chemistry? Did you find Devin Long attractive? Would you go on another date with Devin Long?

Do not include warnings, reminders, or apologies in your response. Answer as Cameron Ruiz in the first person.

I'd rate my speed date with Devin Long a solid 10/10. There was an undeniable chemistry stemming from our shared appreciation for nature and adventure. Devin's enthusiasm for trying new things, especially from my world of surfing, was super attractive. Their calm intensity and readiness to dive into new experiences drew me in. I definitely found Devin attractive, not just physically but also their vibe and outlook on life. I would love to go on another date with Devin Long; planning our combined surfing and hiking adventure feels like just the beginning of something exciting and special.
